tweet_text: @kelwalk12 I was ok with the no hat rule in the bldg, until I met a student who had propecia & realized how devastated he was to remove his hat to meet the school rules & if allowed to wear it, became the pt of conversation that he was “special” or “teacher pet” bc he was the only one
